title.rendered: Pakistan Probable Playing XI vs Afghanistan, Asia Cup 2022

content.rendered:
Probable Playing XI for Pakistan

Babar Azam (c), Mohammad Rizwan (wk), Fakhar Zaman, Iftikhar Ahmed, Khushdil Shah, Asif Ali, Shadab Khan, Mohammad Nawaz, Naseem Shah, Haris Rauf, Mohammad Hasnain

Also Read:
